[[inst_ld_smin]]
==== LD.SMIN

*Syntax:* ld.smin<.{aq, rl, f, aqrl, aqf, rlf, aqrlf}> [SrcL], SrcR, {->t, ->u, ->Rd}

*Description:* Atomic Signed Min operation: memory value is atomically signed mined with register.

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_ld_smin.svg[LD.SMIN encoding,width=800]

*Group:* AMO/AMO
